entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
